text: 18:22: Eze 26:13; Isa 24:818:22-23: Jer 7:34; 25:10 Nangondagi binagi khonjel, mioibagi khonjel, basi amadi peresingga khongbasinggi khonjel amuk hanna keidounungda tararoi. Sinpham amatadagi sinmi amata nangonda keidounungda amuk phanglaroi; aduga chakkrigi makhol amuk hanna taba phanglaroi!
